title: Stage Lv6-D4-S12
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Basel Accord compliance is mandatory. (professional variant 1)
Anti-capital laundering procedures are implemented. (professional variant 1)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Basel Accord compliance is mandatory. (professional variant 1)
Anti-capital laundering procedures are implemented. (professional variant 1)
Know Your Customer verification has been mandated. (professional variant 1)
Regulatory reports have been submitted. (professional variant 1)
Internal control systems have been strengthened. (professional variant 1)
Fiduciary duties must be fulfilled. (professional variant 1)
Transparency requirements have been met. (professional variant 1)
Supervisory authority inspection is scheduled. (professional variant 1)
Sanctions are imposed for compliance violations. (professional variant 1)
Whistleblower protection systems are operational. (professional variant 1)
